quotes.quote: I've long believed that good food, good eating, is all about risk. Whether we're talking about unpasteurized Stilton, raw oysters or working for organized crime associates, food, for me, has always been an adventure.
Laughter is brightest in the place where the food is.
One of the very nicest things about life is the way we must regularly stop whatever it is we are doing and devote our attention to eating.
After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relatives.
The secret of success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate.
If you really want to make a friend, go to someone's house and eat with him - the people who give you their food give you their heart.
One cannot think well, love well and sleep well if one has not dined well.
Popcorn for breakfast! Why not? It's a grain. It's like, like, grits, but with high self-esteem.
The chief pleasure in eating does not consist in costly seasoning, or exquisite flavor, but in yourself.
You can't just eat good food. You've got to talk about it too. And you've got to talk about it to somebody who understands that kind of food.
People who love to eat are always the best people.
Eat breakfast like a king, lunch like a prince, and dinner like a pauper.
Vegetables are a must on a diet. I suggest carrot cake, zucchini bread, and pumpkin pie.
Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.
Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
Only dull people are brilliant at breakfast.
A recipe has no soul. You, as the cook, must bring soul to the recipe.
The sweetest honey Is loathsome in his own deliciousness And in the taste confounds the appetite.
Training is everything. The peach was once a bitter almond; cauliflower is nothing but cabbage with a college education.
Rice is born in water and must die in wine.
I'm pretty sure that eating chocolate keeps wrinkles away because I have never seen a 10 year old with a Hershey bar and crows feet.
If soup isn't hot enough to make a grown man wince, it's undrinkable.
The onion is the truffle of the poor.
Vegetables are food of the earth, but fruits taste of the heavens.
Good bread is the most fundamentally satisfying of all foods; good bread with fresh butter, the greatest of feasts!
Food brings people together on many different levels. It's nourishment of the soul and body; it's truly love.
My general rule is that if everyone knew how to cook fresh produce from their local area, and Monday to Thursday within 20 minutes, you know, there’s millions of recipes out there to be had.

Food is everything we are. It's an extension of nationalist feeling, ethnic feeling, your personal history, your province, your region, your tribe, your grandma. It's inseparable from those from the get-go.
Everything you see I owe to spaghetti.
Food is like sex: When you abstain, even the worst stuff begins to look good.
First we eat, then we do everything else.
Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
People want honest, flavourful food, not some show-off meal that takes days to prepare.
The way you make an omelet reveals your character.
You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.
There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
There are people in the world so hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread.
Pull up a chair. Take a taste. Come join us. Life is so endlessly delicious.
Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you what you are.
Don't dig your grave with your own knife and fork.
In 'The Republic' he [Plato] states that the enjoyment of food is not a true pleasure because the purpose of eating is to relieve pain -- hunger.
A gourmet who thinks of calories is like a tart who looks at her watch.
Animals feed; man eats; only a man of wit knows how to eat.
Stop being a vegan and start enjoying what you eat.
Never eat more than you can lift.
He who eats alone chokes alone.
Cheese is milk's leap toward immortality.
An onion can make people cry, but there has never been a vegetable invented to make them laugh.
Good food ends with good talk.

quotes.cite: Albert Ellis, Michael Abrams, Lidia Dengelegi
quotes.quote: Eating is always a decision, nobody forces your hand to pick up food and put it into your mouth.
I just inhaled kimchi ramen. Nose on fire. Next chapter may be obscured by tears.
A little chocolate a day keeps the doctor at bay
No man is lonely eating spaghetti; it requires so much attention.
Condensed milk is wonderful. I don't see how they can get a cow to sit down on those little cans.
It's difficult to think anything but pleasant thoughts while eating a homegrown tomato.
When baking, follow directions. When cooking, go by your own taste.
If there were only turnips and potatoes in the world, someone would complain that plants grow the wrong way.
Great food is like great sex. The more you have the more you want.
Food is the most primitive form of comfort.
Hunger is a good cook.
Soup is just a way of screwing you out of a meal.
When a man's stomach is full it makes no difference whether he is rich or poor.
If we're not willing to settle for junk living, we certainly shouldn't settle for junk food.
Plant a radish, get a radish, never any doubt. That's why I love vegetables, you know what they're about!
Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.
We don't get fat because we overeat; we overeat because we're getting fat.
You can tell a lot about a fellow's character by his way of eating jellybeans.
To eat is to appropriate by destruction.

Always eat grapes downward - that is, always eat the best grapes first; in this way there will be none better left on the bunch, and each grape will seem good down to the last. If you eat the other way, you will not have a good grape in the lot.
He who does not mind his belly, will hardly mind anything else.
Music with dinner is an insult both to the cook and the violinist.
We are living in a world today where lemonade is made from artificial flavors and furniture polish is made from real lemons.
There ain't no such thing as wrong food.

I wouldn’t say that processed food, ready meals and oven takeaways aren’t relevant to modern life, it’s just that over the past 40 years there are three generations of people who have come out of school and gone through their home life without ever being shown how to cook properly.
Food is better medicine than drugs
Food is the supremest of pleasures.
Let food be your medicine and medicine be your food.

Food for all is a necessity. Food should not be a merchandise to be bought and sold as jewels are bought and sold by those who have the oney to buy. Food is a human necessity, like water and air, and it should be available.
Food plays an important role in every culture.
Good food is an amazing blessing.
The normal food of man is vegetable.
The right use of food can end hunger.
Perfect food is born of perfect order.
Food is so heavily connected to memory.
Good food is the basis of true happiness.
Food is a part of our contract with life.
Food is one of the great organizing tools.
Good food should be a right not a privilege.
Food is culture, and we need to listen to it.
A food's value is based on how good it tastes.
Food can be expressive and therefore food can be art.
Food is music to the body, music is food to the heart.
Good food is very often, even most often, simple food.
What is food to one man may be fierce poison to others.
Food is the only beautiful thing that truly nourishes.
The gift of food to the hungry is the noblest of all gifts.
Simple foods connect with your body's needs in complex ways.
Food is the moral right of all who are born into this world.
Food for the body is not enough. There must be food for the soul.
